## AnswersConfig type

The main configuration options for [AnswersCore](./answers-core.answerscore.md) that requires either apiKey or token.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AnswersConfig = ApiKeyRequiredAnswersConfig | TokenRequiredAnswersConfig;
```
